name: Oblivious Olivia
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 46

UPDATE:  Added flying enemies to prevent players from spamming waves

Olivia is a little oblivious. With her headphones on and eyes glued to the phone, she is completely unaware of the dangers that surround her. As her guardian angel, use your mighty powers to protect her!

*Controls: Click on upper portion of screen to release lightnings. Click on lower portion of screen to summon water pillars.

*The game gets gradually harder as you play.

vote here:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/oblivious-olivia

Twitter @daichifob
